    @allure.title("测试添加用户接口")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    def test_add_user(self, api, logger):
        """
        测试添加用户接口
        :param api: API客户端
        :param logger: 日志记录器
        """
        # 准备测试数据
        random_num = random.randint(1000, 9999)
        user_data = {
            "username": f"testuser{random_num}",
            "name": f"测试用户{random_num}",
            "phone": f"1380000{random_num}",
            "email": f"test{random_num}@example.com",
            "sex": "man",
            "roles": [1],  # 假设1是有效的角色ID
            "is_active": True
        }
    
        logger.info(f"开始测试添加用户接口，测试数据: {user_data}")
    
        # 发送POST请求到添加用户接口
        endpoint = "/api/users"
        response = api.post(endpoint, json_data=user_data)
    
        # 断言响应状态码
